name: One Stick Man!
description:
One Stick Man's platforming adventure to find his stick princess. Experience an exciting and high difficulty styled 2D platformer.


Play through 10 different levels all with their own unique soundtrack!

Run and jump avoiding the spikes!

Displayed on a notebook in the doodlings of a bored kid!

Laugh at the one of kind humor you can only find in RandoMetric games!

Also note you're still lonely, so go find the princess!If you have enjoyed the game please support us on our steam greenlight

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=636420344
